Ngo Thang Long CTO , Horus Team,

Long is true technology enthusiast, who loves to work in areas where humans and machines meet to create amazing new products and services. He lead R&D activities including virtual reality and game He is Phd in Information and Security, Queensland University of Technology, Australia

Q&A

Language: vi Complexity: Intermediate, Beginner

Player's mind: skill - challenge - flow - interest curves

Complexity:

Le Nguyen Minh Game Designer , Divmob

Minh has 5 years of experience in Game Design. He worked as Game Designer at VNG and now is Divmob where he joined a teams that they developed Epic Heroes War (two times get featured global on Google Play), Tank Battle, Galaxy Pirate, Happy Me. Making game products is his passion. He said that : 'Kẻ say mê làm Game không phụ thuộc vào thiên hạ nhiều hay ít người chơi. Giả sử thiên hạ chỉ còn đúng một người chơi Game thì mình vẫn phải nghiền ngẫm mà làm ra Game. Game ấy may ra mới có thể kéo dài được đến đời sau.'

KeyNotes - Unlock the Full Potential of your Games with Google(45')

Language: en Complexity: Beginner

Sami Kizilbash Developer Relations Program Manager, South & Southeast Asia, Google, Google

Google Singapore Google Developers

Sami is the point-of-contact for developer and startup communities across the region as part of Google's global Developer Relations team. Joining Google three years ago, he initially focused on establishing the company's presence across South Asia’s emerging markets, working with the region’s most innovative media creatives, entrepreneurs, and marketers to expand their reach online.Sami also actively mentors technology entrepreneurs and supports startup ecosystems in the region. Prior to Google, Sami founded a Singapore-based technology firm and led the development of cloud-based marketing and business tools catered to SMEs in the region. He has co-produced media products in Asia, Europe, Africa, and the Middle East, including a TV & web series designed to encourage and support entrepreneurship in emerging markets. He has a Management Information Systems degree from McGill University (Canada), and an MBA from INSEAD (France/Singapore) where he specialized in Entrepreneurship and Strategy.

Google BigQuery, how to understand players: Example cases

Language: vi Complexity: Intermediate, Beginner

Nguyen Giang Son CTO, Gimasys Co., Ltd.

Son has been the CTO of Gimasys for 5 years in which his main role is to be the R&D lead to study Google for Work technologies including Google Apps for Work, Chrome for Work, Google Search for Work, Google Maps for Work, Google Cloud Platform and Android for Work and make them accessible to everyone in the company as well as to any enterprise customer who is interested in these products and solutions. With Google Cloud Platfrom, Mr. Son is in charge of receiving technical courses from Google on solutions and deployments to be the first Google Cloud Platform Evangelist in Vietnam.

VMAX, Demo & instruct Mediation configuration with Admob & other Ad Networks

Language: vi Complexity: Intermediate

Q&A and Lucky Draw

Language: vi Complexity: Intermediate

Nguyen Quang Trung Manager of Developer Alliances, Vserv Mobi

Trung is a Manager of Developer Alliances of Vserv in Vietnam. Trung has 5 years of experience in making Mobile Apps Products, Mobile Marketing as well. He worked at Microsoft Vietnam and organized Windows and Windows Phone's communities. He was also key speaker of Microsoft Vietnam in the Office 365 conferences.

Gaby Hien Deputy GM - Developer Alliances, Vserv Mobi

Hien is a Deputy GM - Developer Alliances of Verv Mobi SEA

How to improve your revenue + CodeLab Cardboard

Complexity:

Ngo Van Luyen CEO, Divmob

Luyen has worked in France for 5 years, then come back Vietnam and found DIVMOB in 2012s. Divmob has produced over ten games for both Android, and iOS. Their most successful are Ninja Revenge, Zombie Age 2 and Epic Heroes War, which garnered over three million downloads in the first month of release and were featured on Google Play Home Page in over 30 countries. Zombie Age 2 and Epic Heroes War are featured on Google Play Home page globally, Epic Heroes War was also featured on iTunes Home page as Best New Games. The company was founded in December 2011 and located in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

Welcome greeting from GDG

Language: vi Complexity:

Le Huynh Kim Ngan Manager, GDG Vietnam

Ngan is a dedicated person with a big passion for startups and has a deep insight about the Vietnam's startup eco-system, market and startup people. She is Founder of Action.vn which is the leading tech news in Vietnam, Co-founder of Google Developer Group Viet Nam and trip planner and connector at Triip.me.

AmIClever - Game Story Telling

Complexity:

Le Loc Founder, Mobioneer

He is a lecture of Da Nang University of Science and Technology. He established Mobioneer company which is developing mobile applications. He is a passionate person in game development and will share you his game story named AmIClever.

Professional game production

Language: vi Complexity:

Le Van Khanh Leader of Android HD Division, Gameloft Da Nang

He is a Leader of Android HD Division, Gameloft Da Nang. He has more than 5 years experience in game development and 3 years management experience in game industry. The topic he will share with you is “The professional game production process”. You will be introduced the professional game production process, the challengers and the key notes to be successful. How to raise your game to the top rating. How to keep your game interesting and get more profit?

Smarter Monetization with Google AdMob.

Language: en Complexity:

Fasai Pongpitaksopon Strategic Partner Manager, Google

Google

Fasai Pongpitaksopon has been with Google for over four years. In that time, she has worked across various functions: first, she grew small- and medium-sized businesses across South East Asia with Google AdWords. Next, she shifted roles and now advises strategic partners of Google AdSense and Google AdMob on how to monetize their websites and apps. Fasai is passionate about supporting developers, entrepreneurs, and startups in the region to help grow their businesses sustainably. She’s enthusiastic about inspiring partners to create successful businesses with Google solutions.

Player's mind: skill - challenge - flow - interest curves

Complexity:

Nguyen Vinh Tuong Game Designer , Gameloft

He said that: 'Game là một hành trình, bạn có thể chơi đi chơi lại và chỉ thật sự thất bại khi bạn từ bỏ'. Một số dự án game đã tham gia porting tại Gameloft: Asphalt 8, Tin Tin, Lost Planet, Solitaire.
